means: 捕鼠动物，鬼鬼祟祟搜寻的人

sentence.Network_en: Mouser was tired and began to sleep on her lap.
sentence.Network_cn: 小毛累了,于是就在皇后的膝上睡着了.

sentence.Network_en: The king and queen were very pleased with Mouser.
sentence.Network_cn: 国王和皇后对小毛颇为满意.

sentence.Network_en: The captain put Mouser on the queen's lap.
sentence.Network_cn: 船长将小毛放在皇后的膝上.
